Basel Alghanem

Hi! I'm Basel. I'm a robotics engineer living in Pittsburgh, PA. I care about the social impact of robotics. When I'm not working, I enjoy mentoring a FIRST Robotics team, taking photos, going camping, traveling the world, and playing Team Fortress 2.

Feel free to email me at firstname@umich.edu.
